title: FBI Study Finds 'Active Shooter' Incidents To Be On The Rise
teaser: The FBI released a report on Wednesday detailing the 160 "active shooter" incidents between 2000 and 2013, which included the mass shootings at Virginia Tech and Newtown. A key finding: the average number of incidents nearly tripled in the second half of that period compared to the first half.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
